Public Class XpsDocument Inherits XpsPartBase Implements IDisposable
type XpsDocument = class inherit XpsPartBase interface IDisposable

summary.span: Provides a that holds the content of an XPS document.

span.span: Provides a that holds the content of an XPS document.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 包含包含一个或多个元素。An contains a that comprises one or more elements. 构造函数传递的引用进行编写、 存储和读取该文档的内容元素。The constructor is passed a reference to a for writing, storing, and reading the content elements of the document. 新的空[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)]通过创建构造函数。A new empty [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] is created by using the constructor. 将现有[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)]使用打开方法。An existing [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] is opened by using the method. 一个根添加到一个空[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)]通过调用方法。A root is added to an empty [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] by calling the method. 此外可以与之关联的打印机信息和控件的元素，或针对单个并中存储的元素。 elements with printer information and control can also be associated with the , or on individual and elements that are stored in the . 有关详细信息[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)]请参阅 XML 纸张规范 (XPS) 下载[ http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761 ](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761)。For more information about [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] see the XML Paper Specification (XPS) available for download at [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761).

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)
abstract member Dispose : bool -> unit override this.Dispose : bool -> unit

param.name: disposing
param.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: Releases the unmanaged resources that are used by the and optionally, releases the managed resources.

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources that are used by the and optionally, releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用此方法由公共`Dispose()`方法和方法。This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the method. `Dispose()` 调用受保护`Dispose(Boolean)`方法替换`disposing`参数设置为`true`。`Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. 调用`Dispose`与`disposing`设置为`false`。 invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. 当`disposing`参数为 true 时，此方法释放所有托管对象所持有的所有资源，此的引用。When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources that are held by any managed objects that this references. 此方法调用每个引用对象的 `Dispose()` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.

span.para: 其他对象可以调用多次。当您重写，请小心不要引用已在早期调用中的释放对象。详细了解如何实现，请参阅 [实现 Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。有关详细信息并，请参阅 [清理了非托管 Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) 和 [重写 Finalize 方法] (http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3)。

Other objects can call multiple times. When you override , be careful not to reference objects that were previously disposed of in an earlier call to . For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md). For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`certificate`是`null`，会出现对话框，使用户能够选择已安装的 X.509 证书，如从智能卡读卡器。If `certificate` is `null`, a dialog box appears that enables the user to select an installed X.509 certificate, such as from a smart card reader. ## Examples 下面的示例显示如何使用 方法。The following example shows how to use the method.
